name: Don't burn the film
description:
This Prototype was created during an internal game jam with Technocité, Belgium.

You play "Burny", a spirit living in a digital camera. You exist to help your photographer get the best white balance for his photos.

You must keep your exposure gauge in balance until the time runs out. Dodge the light and shadow shots to stay in balance. But if you are affected, don't panic! You can restore balance by being hit with a shot from the opposite element.

If you succeed, discover the photo you helped to saved. You can also learn more about the history of photography while having fun!

Enjoy !

GAME CONTROLS

Direction : use directional arrows
